content: Unless anyone objects, or knows how to rename, I plan to create a new stream just with a shorter name: "BRR-Pharmacy model". For me at least the current name does not fit in the left hand view, so you cannot see the count of unread messages.
Summoning @Lloyd McKenzie - can we rename this stream to "BRR-Pharmacy model" (and delete the other one with that name) ?
(pinging @Lloyd McKenzie because I forgot before)
